events.title: Code Your First Website - Complete Beginner Workshop
events.description: Never coded before? No problem! Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics to build your first personal website. Laptop provided if needed. FREE for students!

events.title: Git & GitHub for Students - Version Control Bootcamp
events.description: Master the tools every developer needs! Learn Git commands, GitHub workflows, and collaboration. Perfect for CS students working on team projects.

events.title: Build Your First Mobile App with React Native
events.description: Weekend workshop for intermediate learners. Build and deploy a real mobile app to app stores. Bring your app idea!

events.title: From Zero to Internship: Resume & Portfolio Workshop
events.description: Learn how to showcase your projects, build a developer portfolio, and write a tech resume that gets interviews. Guest speakers from top companies!

events.title: Python for Data Science - Student Edition
events.description: Learn Python, pandas, matplotlib for data analysis. Great for business, psychology, and science majors interested in tech!

events.title: Student Hackathon Planning Session
events.description: Planned our upcoming 48-hour student hackathon. Discussed themes, prizes, and mentorship opportunities.

events.title: Coding Interview Prep Workshop
events.description: Practiced leetcode problems, discussed common interview patterns, and learned debugging techniques. Great turnout from seniors!

events.title: Women in Tech Panel & Networking Night
events.description: Inspiring panel with female engineers from Google, Microsoft, and startups. Networking dinner and mentorship matching.
